page.title: 19Communications:N.& O.Silton
page.content: Both Nether Silton & Over Silton have public telephone boxes and almost every house has at telephone installed. There is a Post Office in Nether Silton which is run by a local farmer's wife in a room of her home.It opens every day apart from Sunday (mornings only on Wednesday & Saturday) & provides the usual services i.e.stamps,licences,banking, family allowances & pensions. Post boxes are situated in Nether & Over Silton which are emptied twice daily apart from Saturday when they are emptied only once.There is no collection on Sundays. Post is delivered every day except Sunday early in the morning by a postman (or now a postwoman!)in a small van .There may be delays in the winter when roads have to be cleared.
